paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing for the TTR mutation was done in 50% of patients with confirmed TTR mutation (13 out of 26 patients). The majority of patients (95%) had a val112Ile mutation.

functional_data.summary: The val112Ile mutation is associated with transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study indicates a significant presence of the val112Ile mutation in the cohort.
key_quotes: Genetic testing for the TTR mutation was done in 50% of patients with confirmed TTR mutation (13 out of 26 patients). The majority of patients (95%) had a val112Ile mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
